name: meantodos
description: f22labs Test mod 1 . This app uses MEAN i.e Mongo Express Angular and Node to develop a sigle todos app , this app has an exception  for multi todos as provided in test description , as I found it a bit difficult to implement multilists . For DND and multilist functionality I utilized JquerryUI provided in the next mod 2 for the project.
